videos.headline: Bentley connects with Samuel for Gamecocks' TD
videos.description: Jake Bentley throws down the middle to Deebo Samuel for a 9-yard South Carolina touchdown.

videos.headline: Choice goes up the middle for 1-yard Clemson TD
videos.description: Adam Choice powers his way up the middle for a 1-yard Clemson touchdown.

videos.headline: Lawrence throws dart to Higgins for 22-yard score
videos.description: Trevor Lawrence connects with Tee Higgins across the middle for a 22-yard touchdown.

videos.headline: Wilkins leaps into end zone for 1-yard TD
videos.description: Christian Wilkins takes the pitch and leaps into the end zone for a 1-yard Clemson touchdown.

videos.headline: Bentley finds Pollard for 67-yard TD
videos.description: Jake Bentley rolls out and connects Kiel Pollard who runs into the end zone for a 67-yard South Carolina touchdown.

videos.headline: Bentley connects with Samuel for 75-yard TD
videos.description: Deebo Samuel burns the Clemson defense for a 75-yard touchdown.

videos.headline: South Carolina keeping it close with Clemson at the half
videos.description: Clemson jumps out to a two-score lead, but South Carolina QB Jake Bentley's 302 passing yards has them only trailing 28-21 at halftime.

tracking.trackingName: COM_NCF Highlight (South Carolina keeping it close with Clemson at the half) 2018/11/24 ESHEET SOTFull

videos.headline: Clemson too much for South Carolina
videos.description: Jake Bentley throws for 510 yards and five touchdowns, but Clemson's offense amounts 744 total yards in a 56-35 victory.

tracking.trackingName: COM_NCF Highlight (Clemson too much for South Carolina) 2018/11/24 ESHEET SOTFull
